title: Watch our match against Liverpool Women live !
body_text:
Our Conti Cup champions are back in action this Wednesday evening against Liverpool and you can watch all the action from Meadow Park live, right here on Arsenal.com and the official app.
With the confetti still fresh from Sunday's triumph, it's already time for our Gunners to refocus as we host the Reds in the Women's Super League. We won 2-0 in the reverse fixture back in October thanks to Frida Maanum's dribble and dink, and a beautiful strike from Lia Walti.
We kick off at 7:15pm UK time, so join us on Arsenal.com for live footage and commentary of the game. Nicole Holliday and Adrian Clarke will also be in the studio for a special Breakdown Live from 7pm onwards.
If watching on the app, please ensure you've updated to the latest version - iOS / Android
